text: Ezɨ puvatɨ, Asahel tong a barazir puvatɨ. Kamagh amizɨ, Apner gɨrakɨrangɨn moghɨn afuzir konimɨn Asahelɨn navim bɨrazɨma, afuzim anemɨkɨragha vongɨn an akɨrir agharimɨn oto. Ezɨ Asahel irɨghava areme. Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumazir igharaziba iza garima, Asahelɨn kuam irɨghav iti, ezɨ me danganir kamɨn tuivighav ikia pura gari.
